channel.title: L33tsc4p3.no-ip.biz to serve legal action
channel.description:
Well a few minutes ago I got in touch with a law officer that I knew from my community, and I gave him information about this issue.
I told him that the server L33tsc4p3.no-ip.biz was using copyrighted material to try to make a profit and business off of it.
I had given him evidence; screenshots that I took showing the administrator of the server there trying to sell the server or trying to sell mod/admin positions, he said it's happened before and it is illegal.
He says he was going to look into it further, and I am waiting for a response at this time. I know for sure that he's going to be taken to court and penalties may result from there. Depending on what the judge says.
Please don't be like that server, it's okay to have a server you just can't say it's your own or try to run a business off of it. I will hunt your server down and I WILL get legal action served on you!

@_Rich wrote:

I usually wouldn’t post on something like this, but I lol’d so hard.

Read full topic
